breakfast.name: High-Protein Chicken & Egg Fried Rice
breakfast.description: A protein-packed breakfast bowl combining chicken, eggs and rice in a savory stir-fry.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions (can be done ahead of time)
Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken pieces until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes
Push chicken to one side of the pan and crack eggs on the other side
Scramble eggs until just set, then mix with the chicken
Add cooked rice to the pan and stir to combine
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving

lunch.name: Chicken & Egg Fried Rice
lunch.description: A protein-packed fried rice with chunks of chicken and scrambled eggs mixed with fluffy rice.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into the pan and scramble
Add cooked rice and mix everything together
Drizzle with soy sauce and stir-fry for 3 minutes
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving

lunch.name: Chicken Fried Rice Bowl
lunch.description: A high-protein lunch combining tender chicken pieces with fluffy rice and scrambled eggs.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until no longer pink
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into the pan and scramble
Add cooked rice, garlic, soy sauce, salt and pepper
Stir-fry everything together for 3-4 minutes until well combined and heated through
Serve hot in a bowl

dinner.name: Chicken Fried Rice
dinner.description: A protein-packed fried rice with chunks of chicken and scrambled eggs.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until no longer pink (5-7 minutes)
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into pan and scramble
Add cooked rice, minced garlic, and soy sauce
Stir-fry everything together for 3-4 minutes
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving

dinner.name: Chicken Fried Rice with Egg
dinner.description: A protein-packed fried rice dish featuring diced chicken, fluffy rice, and scrambled eggs.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into the empty space
Scramble eggs until just set, then mix with chicken
Add cooked rice, minced garlic, salt and pepper
Stir-fry everything together for 3-4 minutes until well combined and heated through
